DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Reslizumab effective treatment chronic sinusitis .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Written inform consent 2 . Willingness ability comply requirement study 3 . Female male patient age 1875 time screen 4 . A diagnosis chronic rhinosinusitis accord clinical practice guideline ( update ) American academy otolaryngology head neck surgery 5 . Elevated blood eosinophils 6 . Significant finding compute tomography ( CT ) scan 1 . Unable sign inform consent form 2 . A woman pregnant nursing child 3 . Known hypersensitivity Reslizumab 4 . Active cigarette smoking year prior screen 5 . Known underlying immunodeficiency 6 . History alcohol drug abuse year prior screen Other criterion may apply . Please contact investigator information
